arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid star opens up on mental health struggles in injury recovery
arts.sum: Saul Niguez has opened up on his long road back from injury on loan at Sevilla this season. With his career at a crossroads ahead of the 2024/25 campaign, the Spanish international accepted a season-long loan out of Atletico Madrid, to revive his La Liga fortunes. Los Rojiblancos were happy to offload him, with his […] The post Atletico Madrid star opens up on mental health struggles in injury recovery appeared first on Football España.
